Interface LoaderConfigurationChildBuilder<S>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationChildBuilder, PersistenceConfigurationChildBuilder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JdbcMixedStoreConfigurationChildBuilder<S>, JdbcStoreConfigurationChildBuilder<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface LoaderConfigurationChildBuilder<S>
extends PersistenceConfigurationChildBuilder
    LoaderConfigurationBuilder is an interface which should be implemented by all cache loader builders
    Since:

    Author:
